mapper.select: SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, cloud_account.NAME AS account_name, cloud_account.platform AS platform, CASE WHEN orgWorkspace.type = "workspace" THEN orgWorkspace.id ELSE NULL END AS workspace_id, CASE WHEN orgWorkspace.type = "workspace" THEN orgWorkspace.NAME ELSE NULL END AS workspace_name, orgWorkspace.organization_id, orgWorkspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace orgWorkspace ON vm_cloud_server.workspace_id = orgWorkspace.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, workspace._name AS workspace_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN workspace ON vm_cloud_server.workspace_id = workspace.id WHERE vm_cloud_server.account_id = #{accountId} AND vm_cloud_server.zone = #{zone} AND instance_status != 'deleted'

SELECT count(vm_cloud_server.id) as vm_count, org_workspace.id, org_workspace.name, org_workspace.pid FROM org_workspace LEFT JOIN vm_cloud_server ON org_workspace.id = vm_cloud_server.source_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT id FROM vm_cloud_server WHERE last_shutdown_time IS NOT NULL AND instance_status = 'Running' AND instance_charge_type = 'PostPaid' AND now() > ADDDATE( last_shutdown_time, INTERVAL #{days} DAY )

SELECT id FROM vm_cloud_server WHERE last_shutdown_time IS NOT NULL AND instance_status = 'Stopped' AND instance_charge_type = 'PrePaid' AND now() > ADDDATE( last_shutdown_time, INTERVAL #{days} DAY )
SELECT id FROM vm_cloud_server WHERE last_shutdown_time IS NOT NULL AND instance_status = 'Stopped' AND now() > ADDDATE( last_shutdown_time, INTERVAL #{days} DAY )
